LanguageData.AF_MakeSydailyVine_L.label: 【L】Cut Sydaily Vine
LanguageData.AF_MakeSydailyVine_L.description:
To cut off some of the vines from the Sydaily flower. 

The vine that loses its crystal will wither in a very short time and rot away! Use immediately after they are detached from the stamen! 

(don't worry about hurting the flowers, they'll grow back soon~)
